REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0169 reute h f BC-MFS-MANAGED-MUNCIPAL 03-02 0052

TEXT.TITLE: MFS MANAGED MUNCIPAL BOND TRUST SETS PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: <MFS Managed Muncipal Trust Bond> said it declared a monthly payout income distribution of 5.7 cts a share compared with 5.6 cts for the previous month. It said the distribution is payable March 20 to shareholders of record March two. Reuter
